name: Chicken Divan
author: Beth
summary: This is a recipe to serve your mother-in-law; we call it a 'bride basic'. It differs from some Chicken Divan recipes because of the curry. Men love this. Wonderful! The ingredients can be 'assembled' and frozen, then baked when you're ready. Serve with rice and a fruit salad, if desired.
ingredients: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of chicken soup
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Arrange cooked broccoli in prepared baking dish
Add mushrooms and water chestnuts (see Cook's Note)
In a medium bowl, combine the soup, mayonnaise, lemon juice, curry powder, and melted butter
Mix together and pour sauce mixture over chicken and vegetables
Sprinkle cheese on top and bake in the preheated oven until the casserole is bubbly and the cheese is golden brown, 30 to 45 minutes
